testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.1.1 [Need to Share Detector Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R377_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R377_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R379_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R379_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N18R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Detector Station Inventory Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R447_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R447_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Lane Number - Detector Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R448_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R448_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Speed Trap Flag is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R449_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R449_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R450_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R450_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R451_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R451_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 3 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R452_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R452_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 4 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R453_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R453_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 5 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R454_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R454_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Bin 6 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported = ${TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported}
Step 27 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 29 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 30 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N18R441_Send_Detector_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 31 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.1 VERIFY that element detector-station-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 31.2 VERIFY that element detector-station-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 31.3 VERIFY that element detector-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.4 VERIFY that element detector-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.5 VERIFY that element detector-station-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 31.6 VERIFY that element detector-station-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 31.7 VERIFY that element organization-information exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.8 VERIFY that element device-id exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.9 VERIFY that element device-location exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.10 VERIFY that element device-name exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.11 VERIFY that element detectorInventoryMsg exists.
Step 31.12 VERIFY that element detector-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.13 VERIFY that element detector-type exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.14 IF TMDD_N18R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.14.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.15 IF TMDD_N18R377_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.15.1 VERIFY that element device-description exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.16 IF TMDD_N18R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.16.1 VERIFY that element device-control-type exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.17 IF TMDD_N18R379_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.17.1 VERIFY that element controller-description exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.18 IF TMDD_N18R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.18.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.19 IF TMDD_N18R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.19.1 VERIFY that element node-id exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.20 IF TMDD_N18R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.20.1 VERIFY that element node-name exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.21 IF TMDD_N18R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.21.1 VERIFY that element link-id exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.22 IF TMDD_N18R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.22.1 VERIFY that element link-name exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.23 IF TMDD_N18R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.23.1 VERIFY that element link-direction exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.24 IF TMDD_N18R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.24.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.25 IF TMDD_N18R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.25.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference-version exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.26 IF TMDD_N18R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.26.1 VERIFY that element route-designator exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.27 IF TMDD_N18R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.27.1 VERIFY that element device-url exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.28 IF TMDD_N18R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.28.1 VERIFY that element url-reference-medium exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector.detector-inventory-header.device-url
Step 31.28.2 VERIFY that element url-reference-medium exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header.device-url
Step 31.29 IF TMDD_N18R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.29.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-station-inventory-header
Step 31.30 IF TMDD_N18R447_Detector_Station_Inventory_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.30.1 VERIFY that element detector-station-inventory-header exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item
Step 31.31 IF TMDD_N18R448_Lane_Number___Detector_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.31.1 VERIFY that element detection-lanes exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.32 IF TMDD_N18R449_Speed_Trap_Flag_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.32.1 VERIFY that element is-detector-speed-trap-flag exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.33 IF TMDD_N18R450_Vehicle_Bin_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.33.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin1 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.34 IF TMDD_N18R451_Vehicle_Bin_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.34.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin2 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.35 IF TMDD_N18R452_Vehicle_Bin_3_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.35.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin3 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.36 IF TMDD_N18R453_Vehicle_Bin_4_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.36.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin4 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.37 IF TMDD_N18R454_Vehicle_Bin_5_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.37.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin5 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.38 IF TMDD_N18R455_Vehicle_Bin_6_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 31.38.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-classification-bin6 exists within each instance of detectorInventoryMsg.detector-inventory-item.detector-inventory-list.detector
Step 31.39 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
